name: Grot Slasher
description:
Grot Slasher is a roguelike with RPG elements.

Upgrade your character and try to survive in an endless maze filled
with scary creatures. Smash all the items on the level so that the souls that
have been hiding there for several hundred years get out of them, and move further along the dungeon.

Features:
- Nice graphics.
- Random level generation.
- Different behavior of enemies that improve with the character.
